segments.text: I'm really worried about what I see here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting for a cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating a slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink is completely unaware of the hazards around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the open cabinet doors, adding to the risk of someone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall and hurt himself at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman could slip on the wet floor and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone stays safe and nothing bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
